title: Fedwiki Media Archive
synopsis: The aim is to create a decentralised media archive for Fedwiki. This project relates to the [[Permanent Wiki]] project and the aim to create a new [[Microservice Wiki Server]].

synopsis: Here we list a few tools that are of particular use in managing and creating [[Fedwiki]] content.

title: Pinterest Pin
synopsis: BBC Media Action runs a project in Myanmar creating a range of TV and radio content focusing on different issues.  RadioActive Director Max Graef went out to Myanmar to train up the different BBC MA production teams in technical skills and sound recording techniques for radio and TV, to improve the quality of the output they were producing.

title: Schema for MediaObject
synopsis: An image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's) - [https://schema.org/MediaObject schema.org]

title: Twitter API
synopsis: Here we look at ways to integrate Fedwiki with Twitter.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Here we research and build [[Media Tools]] for the [[Fedwiki Media Archive]]. In particular we look at how we handle photos, video and audio in wiki.
